column4: will someone help me see if my webcam and voice mic work in empathy please? yahoo i.d. is hardcore_zaccour
this is supposed to be a help channel. does this mean that no one here is capable of logging into yahoo messenger?
a number or address that just plays back what you say.
for what i'm concerned, i'm definitely not going to talk over the microphone with a stranger.
doesn't that voice chat have a loopback number? it should have.
i don't know what a loopback number is and i would do the talking
